articles.description: Ruben Amorim says he is the 'right guy at the right time' to turn Manchester United around.
articles.title: Ruben Amorim: New Manchester United boss says he is the 'right guy' for the job

articles.description: India rally to seize the initiative despite being dismissed for just 150 by Australia on the opening day of the first Test in Perth.
articles.title: Australia vs India: Virat Kohli fails again as 17 wickets fall on opening day of first Test in Perth

articles.description: Pep Guardiola says he will stand by Manchester City even if they are relegated over alleged breaches of financial rules.
articles.title: Pep Guardiola promises to stay at Manchester City even if relegated

articles.description: Tom Curry and Sam Underhill – nicknamed the "Kamikaze Kids" by Eddie Jones – will start together in the back row for England against Jones’ Japan on Sunday.
articles.title: England v Japan: George Furbank and Tom Curry return to starting XV

articles.description: A majority of Premier League clubs approve changes to rules governing commercial deals.
articles.title: Associated Party Transaction rules: Premier League clubs approve changes to rules governing commercial deals

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton is fastest in a Mercedes one-two in first practice for the Las Vegas Grand Prix.
articles.title: Las Vegas Grand Prix: Lewis Hamilton leads George Russell in first practice

articles.description: Matt Fagerson will earn his 50th cap in Scotland's final Autumn Nations Series match against Australia, with Jamie Ritchie also starting in the back row.
articles.title: Scotland v Australia: Fagerson to earn 50th cap as Ritchie returns

articles.description: Arsenal defender Ben White is ruled out for "months" after having knee surgery, manager Mikel Arteta confirms.
articles.title: Arsenal defender Ben White ruled out for 'months' after knee surgery

articles.description: England will host world champions Spain in their first home game of the 2025 Nations League.
articles.title: England: Lionesses to face Spain at Wembley in Nations League

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on The Farm singer and Liverpool fan Peter Hooton with his predictions for this weekend's Premier League fixtures.
articles.title: Premier League predictions: Chris Sutton v The Farm singer & Liverpool fan Peter Hooton
